reg:regulation.reg:acttitle: Pharmacy Operations and Drug Scheduling Act
reg:regulation.reg:title: Prescribed Number of Days Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:text: The prescribed number of days for the purposes of sections 21 (5) and 22 (2.1) of the Pharmacy Operations and Drug Scheduling Act is 60 days.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Pharmacy Operations and Drug Scheduling Act, S.B.C. 2003, c. 77, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: sections 21 (5), 22 (2.1) and 34.1]
